name: NeocontrolSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on Master”
”Alexa, turn on Party”
”Alexa, turn on Good Night”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Amazon Alexa and Neocontrol Pro work together to help you to set a delightful and confortable scenario for your smart home.

The Neocontrol Pro is an complete, plug and play home automation system with the main purpose of family care. It is a solution that enables yout o control lights, motorized curtains and monitor all doors and windows of your house.

To enable Alexa to control the Neocontrol Pro system, you need to download the InteO app (https://itunes.apple.com/br/app/neocontrol-pro/id1145029258?mt=8) to configure your automation.

There's no need to open your Neocontrol Pro app to execute the scenarios for your home, is just to say: Alexa.

Try saying:
 "Alexa, turn on Master." 
 "Alexa, turn on Party".
 "Alexa, turn on Good Night".
 "Alexa, turn off Master".

Learn more about how Neocontrol Pro works: https://www.neocontrolglobal.com/
